titleStmt.title: Letter From Roncière Lenour, the Contre Admiral, Head of State-Major Charged of the 1st Direction, to Mister Director of the Colonies, January 21, 1863

bibl.title: Letter From Roncière Lenour, the Coutre Admiral, Head of State-Major Charged of the 1st Direction, to Mister Director of the Colonies

correspAction.roleName: the Contre Admiral, Head of State-Major Charged of the 1st Direction

div1.ab: Ministère la Marine et des Colonies.
Les réponses doivent être adressées au Ministre et portes en marge l'indication dessus.
Note pour la Direction des Colonies
div1.p: J'ai l'honneur de communiquer ci-joint Monsieur le Directeur des Colonies, au projet de dépèeche préparé sous le double timbre des 1ère et 4e. Directions et ayant pour objet de communiquer à M. le Ministre des Affaires Etrangères un rapport de M. le Capitaine de Vau Didelot concernant l'arriveé au Gabon d'un Sr. Francis May en qualité d'Agent Commercial des Etats Unis.
Je serai obligé à Monsieur Toepffer de vouloir bien me renvoyer le plustôt possible ce projet de dépêche accompagné s'il y a lieu, des observations qu'il pourrait lui suggérer.
Le Contre Amiral, Chef d'Etat - major, chargé de la 1ere. Direction, de la Roncierè - Le Noury

div1.ab: Minister the Navy and the Colonies.
The responses need to be addressed to the Minister and put in the margin the indication above.
Note for the Direction of the Colonies
div1.p: I have the honnor of communication enclosed Mister Director of the Colonies, with the intention to dispatch prepared under the double stamp the 1st and 4th Directions and having the objective of communicating to Mr. Minister of Foreign Affairs a report of Mr. Captain of Vau Didelot concerning the arrival in Gabon of Sr. Francis May in quality of Commercial Officer of the United States.
I will be obliged to Mister Toepffer to resend to me as soon as possible this intention of dispatch accompanied if there is a place, the observations that he could suggest to him.
The Opposition Admiral, Chief of State - major, charged with the 1st. Direction, of Roncierè - Le Noury
